title: Gold by Gemini
description: One of the most likable rogues in mystery history. The British-Roman coins had been around for centuries, so when they disappear from a local museum, Lovejoy has a more than passing interest in finding them. Abandoning his usual pursuits of good buys and willing women, Lovejoy finds himself in the much less agreeable company of one Dandy Jack, the sinister Rink, and the lovely, treacheerous Nicole. They lead him on a merry chase through a countryside filled with heather and danger. A superb tour through the glittering and greedy world of antiques. Previously published in England under the title, Gold From Gemini.
author: Jonathan Gash
